title: League of Legends accounts are now Riot Accounts ??? What the facking wrong
body:
Today, I opened my league of heroes as usual, ready to have a good time. But when I log in, a white page pops up on the game homepage, which says "lead of legends accounts are now riot accounts", and there is a link below. When I click this link, I open a sign in page of riot. After entering the account number and password in the OCE area, I went to a page with account update required ([https://update-account.riotgames.com/]. But there are serious problems. Every time I click the next button, I will re-enter the sign in page of riot, and after I enter the password, I will jump to the account update required page, which is a dead cycle.

I really don't know what i should do now. Do you want me to recreate an account in PBE area from scratch? What about my account in OCE, my experience and money? I just want to play this game. Why is it soooooooooo facking difficult?
